name: Guy Van den Broeck
content: Guy Van den Broeck - News Guy Van den Broeck UCLA - Computer Science Department Engineering VI Room 368A 404 Westwood Plaza Los Angeles, CA 90095-1596 Your browser does not support the audio element. Pronounce my name guyvdb@cs.ucla.edu guy@sigmoid.social @guyvdb I am a Professor of Computer Science and Samueli Fellow at UCLA, where I direct the Statistical and Relational Artificial Intelligence (StarAI) lab. My research interests are in Machine Learning (Tractable Deep Generative Models, Statistical Relational Learning, Probabilistic Programming), Knowledge Representation and Reasoning (Probabilistic Inference, Probabilistic Databases), and Artificial Intelligence in general.
